channel.title: App design, opinions needed
channel.description:
Hello
I'm developing a very small Android app for http://www.alphabetagamer.com and need some opinions on the design. It lacks something but I'm not really sure what. Any tips? Thanks!
[img]https://scontent-ams3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xfp1/v/t1.0-9/11960068_10207662339535385_3194604187431595264_n.jpg?oh=485d98fe40064a03b0fd9f0219141aeb&oe=566B1769[/img] [img]https://scontent-ams3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xpt1/v/t1.0-9/11892184_10207662338855368_2985360238649850725_n.jpg?oh=49de4cde3f93070003982140824b919a&oe=566DDF88[/img] [img]https://scontent-ams3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xfp1/v/t1.0-9/11904731_10207662337975346_2726271755414957566_n.jpg?oh=395889a52f7faae666d037e39f3c8623&oe=566902EE[/img] [img]https://scontent-ams3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xpf1/v/t1.0-9/11888101_10207662337535335_2532678324658494655_n.jpg?oh=fad5b8732e802ed460e0c92c7927c17a&oe=56781451[/img]
UPDATE
I redesigned the app: [img]https://scontent-ams3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xlp1/v/t1.0-9/11951115_10207670735185271_8672172931895460952_n.jpg?oh=7c04902124bb1da7474834a50ff2555f&oe=56677CA9[/img] [img]https://scontent-ams3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xfp1/v/t1.0-9/11954656_10207670733185221_5054626366116804398_n.jpg?oh=7f94084a7810870f0856ac0364a09498&oe=567BDBBC[/img] [img]https://scontent-ams3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xfp1/v/t1.0-9/11058395_10207670732585206_6042556609494623102_n.jpg?oh=d3637c43b0bee49cc5a187d380545829&oe=56804DD4[/img] [img]https://scontent-ams3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-xpa1/v/t1.0-9/11947640_10207670731985191_4285371035880932398_n.jpg?oh=586aa57eea1018ea742ecf66d59a521f&oe=567BAB75[/img]

item.title: App design, opinions needed

item.description:
@Kattoor wrote:

Hello

I’m developing a very small Android app for http://www.alphabetagamer.com and need some opinions on the design.
It lacks something but I’m not really sure what. Any tips? Thanks!




UPDATE
